title: Why does playing solo queue not reward anyone?
body: I just find it really annoying that when I play ranked I often go up against groups of three people and lose (Obviously) I still lose the same amount of LP as if I had lost against 5 randoms, which I find ridiculous because it takes a lot less effort to speak to people on skype to communicate effectively whereas using pings and typing is both time consuming and imprecise, so the people who lose are punished for not being able to play well against a team that can talk to each other, but on the flip side, when I play with a friend and we pick up a win, we get a minimal amount of LP for winning, so it's either play three times as many games with friends to have a better chance of winning, while still potentially losing just as much LP or play by myself and have a lesser chance of winning just to get a reasonable amount of LP. It really impacts on my will to play ranked, because it makes the things I do in games feel worthless when at the end of the day if I win 3 games with a friend I can still go up against a 3 man party and lose it all.

replies.body: I think playing solo is like an entirely new challenge in itself. Its like carrying yourself rather than getting help. It results in more exciting wins and to be honest, I play better by myself because most of my friends don't take ranked seriously or are just Bronze 5 scrub lords who think rammus adc is the new Meta... but I know what you mean about how it is unfair that solo queue players get matched against groups, I think they just need to make it 100% solo and then have a separate queue for groups of 5. and if you just wanna play with one or two friends, then just play normals until you get a few extra people. That way you could take ranked seriously as a team and also as a solo queue player ... dynamic queue was not the best idea riot has ever had ... I don't really understand why they even did it. I mean it is nice to always get the roll you want... pretty much but it leaves a lot to be desired in terms of match making time and game balance.

The reason they told us they implemented Dynamic is because of people asking to play ranked with their friends.

Ironically i think more people complain since dynamic has come into being.

I wouldn't be surprised if Riot cave and Season 7 is solo queue.
Lel, yea I feel that. Riot, living the hard life :,(

What do you mean you get nothing? You get an Emblem that shows you play mostly solo (I love how Rito added it as if it means anything at all and is a good solution for dynamic queue).

I still can't believe they don't have an Emblem called Fire Emblem. So much missed [strikethrough]puns[/strikethrough] potential.
